patthana23.25:1.1: Napītisahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
patthana23.25:2.1: Napītisahagataṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā pītisahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
patthana23.25:3.1_0: Napītisahagato naabyākato dhammo pītisahagatassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana23.25:3.1_1: paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā anantare aṭṭhavīsa …pe… upanissaye
patthana23.25:3.1_2: aṭṭhavīsa, kamme catuvīsa, natthiyā vigate aṭṭhavīsa.
